name: M.I.A.
description:
M.I.A. is an Adventure and Puzzle Platformer made by "Fator Replay", a group of students from the 3rd term in Game Design at UAM (Universidade Anhembi Morumbi - São Paulo, Brazil).

As a cybernetic cop you'll have to rescue a mysterious girl that seems to carry some secret about yourself.
As you move forward, things beging to make less and less sense, taking you through a psychedelic trip to find out what your memories hide.

Inspired by "Philip K. Dicks" tale "We Can Remember It for You Wholesale", M.I.A. was our first game made with Unity. We finished that prototypea while ago, but since then the game development is on hold.
There are some bugs and the game is not very polished, so there may be some issues while playing.

We would love to hear you opinions and feedbacks about this project.
